author: Corne Beneke
comment: How do I close it on my g watch? Please answer me, thank you

author: Laswhawn Wiley
comment: Only thing to change if possible, to close the app should only work by long pressing one button not any, because I should be able to long press operations button as long as I want to find which button I want to press. Please fix that to get 5 stars. Thanks dev.
title: The most attractive calculator by far

author: Brandon Kuenzi
comment: Needs moto 360 improvements. Some of the UI is off screen. If this gets fixed I will give this app 6 stars and 3 thumbs up. Great app.
title: Absolutely Beautiful and well made.

comment: But too simple and no history.
title: It's clean and beautiful.
